thread.title: NBA buzz: Charlotte Hornets' Michael Kidd-Gilchrist likely out for season ... - NOLA.com
thread.title_full: NBA buzz: Charlotte Hornets' Michael Kidd-Gilchrist likely out for season ... - NOLA.com

title: NBA buzz: Charlotte Hornets' Michael Kidd-Gilchrist likely out for season ... - NOLA.com
text:
Comments 
Charlotte Hornets forward Michael Kidd-Gilchrist will likely miss the entire upcoming regular season because of a torn labrum that will require surgery to repair, according to Yahoo Sports. 
Kidd-Gilchrist suffered the injury in Saturday's preseason game against the Orlando Magic. Kidd-Gilchrist is expected to miss six months with the injury. 
FEUD: Oklahoma City Thunder star Kevin Durant and ESPN's Stephen A. Smith are feuding publicly . The rift started last Friday when Durant said a comment by Smith indicating that the All-Star forward would consider Los Angeles his "primary objective" if he didn't re-sign with the Thunder next summer is not true. Both have made comments about each other on Twitter.
